REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0052 reute u f BC-AIRGAS-<AGA>-DECLINES 03-02 0044

TEXT.TITLE: AIRGAS <AGA> DECLINES TO COMMENT ON STOCK MOVES
TEXT.BODY: The New York Stock Exchange said Airgas Inc declined to comment on its stock activity after a request for an explanation by the exchange. The company's stock was up 1-1/8 points to 11 dlrs. Reuter
